name: crud_user-main
description: This is a MERN stack application that allows users to register with their personal information and profile picture. The application provides API endpoints for user registration, viewing user data, updating user data, and deleting users. It also includes a front-end built with React.js for interacting with these APIs.

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd backend && npm install && node server.js
